mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAFE ( C_CODE, C_NAME, C_OWNER, C_NUMBER, C_ADDRESS, C_STATUS, C_LA, C_LO, ID, STARTTIME, C_WIFI, C_TOILET, C_PARKING, C_MESSAGE, ENDTIME, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO1, PHOTO2, PHOTO3 ) VALUES ( 'CA' || CA.NEXTVAL, #{caName}, '최준', '111-22-3333', #{caAddress}, DEFAULT, #{caLa}, #{caLo}, #{caId}, #{caStartTime}, #{wifi}, #{toilet}, #{parking}, #{message}, #{caEndTime}, #{mainPhoto}, #{photo1}, #{photo2}, #{photo3} )
mapper.select: SELECT C_CODE, C_NAME, C_ADDRESS, C_LA, C_LO, ID, STARTTIME, C_WIFI, C_TOILET, C_PARKING, C_MESSAGE, ENDTIME, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO1, PHOTO2, PHOTO3 FROM CAFE WHERE ID = #{Id} AND C_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C_CODE DESC

mapper.update: UPDATE CAFE SET C_NAME = #{caName}, C_ADDRESS = #{caAddress}, C_LA = #{caLa}, C_LO = #{caLo}, C_STATUS = 'Y', STARTTIME = #{caStartTime}, C_WIFI = #{wifi}, C_TOILET= #{toilet}, C_PARKING = #{parking}, C_MESSAGE = #{message}, ENDTIME = #{caEndTime}, MAINPHOTO = #{mainPhoto}, PHOTO1 = #{photo1}, PHOTO2 = #{photo2}, PHOTO3 = #{photo3} WHERE C_CODE = #{caCode}
mapper.select: SELECT CF_NO, CF_CATEGORY, CF_INAME, CF_ICHNAME, CF_IPATH, CF_NAME, CF_PRICE, CF_COUNT, CO.C_CODE FROM COFFEE CO FULL OUTER JOIN CAFE CA ON CO.C_CODE = CA.C_CODE WHERE CA.C_CODE = #{caCode} ORDER BY CF_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COFFEE ( CF_NO, CF_CATEGORY, CF_INAME, CF_ICHNAME, CF_IPATH, CF_NAME, CF_PRICE, CF_COUNT, C_CODE ) VALUES ( 'CO' || CO.NEXTVAL, #{cfCategory}, #{cfIname}, #{cfIchname}, #{chIpath}, #{cfName}, #{cfPrice}, #{cfCount}, #{caNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT CF_NO, CF_CATEGORY, CF_INAME, CF_ICHNAME, CF_IPATH, CF_NAME, CF_PRICE, CF_COUNT, C_CODE FROM COFFEE WHERE CF_NO = #{cfNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE COFFEE SET CF_NO = #{cfNo}, CF_CATEGORY = #{cfCategory}, CF_INAME = #{cfIname}, CF_ICHNAME = #{cfIchname}, CF_IPATH = #{chIpath}, CF_NAME = #{cfName}, CF_PRICE = #{cfPrice}, CF_COUNT = #{cfCount}, C_CODE = #{caNo} WHERE CF_NO = #{cfNo}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CORES ( CF_RES, CF_RES_HI, CF_RES_CAP, CF_RES_CUP, C_RES, CF_AMOUNT, CF_NO ) VALUES ( 'COR' || CO_RES.NEXTVAL, #{cfResHI}, #{cfResCap}, #{cfResCup}, #{caResNo}, #{cfResAmount}, #{cfNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT CF_RES, CF_RES_HI, CF_RES_CAP, CF_RES_CUP, COR.C_RES, CF_AMOUNT, COR.CF_NO, CO.CF_ICHNAME, CO.CF_NAME, CO.CF_PRICE, CO.CF_COUNT, CAR.C_RES_DATE, CAR.C_RES_TYPE, CAR.C_HERETIME, CAR.C_GOTIME, CAR.ID FROM CORES COR, COFFEE CO, CARES CAR WHERE COR.CF_NO = CO.CF_NO AND COR.C_RES = CAR.C_RES AND COR.C_RES = #{caResNo} AND CAR.ID = #{id}
SELECT CF_RES, CF_RES_HI, CF_RES_CAP, CF_RES_CUP, C_RES, CF_AMOUNT, COR.CF_NO, CF_ICHNAME, CF_NAME, CF_PRICE FROM CORES COR, COFFEE CO WHERE COR.CF_NO = CO.CF_NO AND C_RES = #{caResNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO, REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_REASON, ISWARNED, ISCHECKED, IMGNAME, IMGPATH, IMGCHNAME, REPORTER_ID, ITEM_CODE, REPORTEE_ID ) VALUES ( 'CARP' || CARP.NEXTVAL, #{reportType}, #{reportReason}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{reporterId}, #{itemCode}, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT C_CODE, C_NAME, C_ADDRESS, C_LA, C_LO, ID, STARTTIME, C_WIFI, C_TOILET, C_PARKING, C_MESSAGE, ENDTIME, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO1, PHOTO2, PHOTO3 FROM CAFE WHERE C_STATUS = 'Y' AND C_NAME LIKE '%' || #{sv} || '%' OR C_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{sv} || '%' ORDER BY C_CODE DESC

SELECT C_RES, C_RES_TYPE, C_RES_DATE, C_RES_PER, (SELECT C_CODE FROM CAFE WHERE ID = #{Id}), CAR.ID, C_HERETIME, C_GOTIME FROM CARES CAR INNER JOIN CAFE C ON(CAR.C_CODE = C.C_CODE) WHERE C.ID = #{Id}

SELECT CAR.C_RES, CAR.C_RES_TYPE, CAR.C_RES_DATE, CAR.C_CODE, CAR.ID, CAR.C_RES_ING, CAR.C_HERETIME, CAR.C_GOTIME, CO.CF_NAME, M.NAME, M.PHONE FROM CARES CAR INNER JOIN CORES COR ON(COR.C_RES = CAR.C_RES) INNER JOIN COFFEE CO ON(CO.CF_NO = COR.CF_NO) INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON(CAR.ID = M.ID) WHERE CAR.C_CODE = (SELECT C_CODE FROM CAFE WHERE ID = #{Id}) AND CAR.C_RES_DATE = SYSDATE ORDER BY CAR.C_RES_DATE, CAR.C_HERETIME, CAR.C_GOTIME

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CARES CAR INNER JOIN CORES COR ON(COR.C_RES = CAR.C_RES) INNER JOIN COFFEE CO ON(CO.CF_NO = COR.CF_NO) INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON(CAR.ID = M.ID) WHERE CAR.C_CODE = (SELECT C_CODE FROM CAFE WHERE ID = #{id}) AND CAR.C_RES_DATE = #{checkDate} ORDER BY CAR.C_RES_DATE, CAR.C_HERETIME, CAR.C_GOTIME
